sources.title: 1945 - Escape in the Fog - Fuga en la niebla - Budd Boetticher - VOSE
Escape in the Fog (1945) Otto Kruger, Nina Foch, William Wright, Shelley Winters
sources.description: Escape in the Fog is a 1945 American B-movie Film Noir directed by Budd Boetticher (as Oscar Boetticher Jr.) and starring Otto Kruger, Nina Foch and William Wright.   Shelley Winters also makes a brief appearance,  playing the uncredited role of a taxi driver. This was one of the various bit parts played by Winters at Columbia prior to the move to Universal in 1947, where she achieved stardom with her breakout performance as the victim of insane actor Ronald Colman in George Cukor's A Double Life.   This Wikipedia article provides more information about the movie.

metadata.Plot: A military nurse recovering at an inn from a nervous breakdown keeps having dreams where she sees two men trying to murder a third. When she meets a man who is a federal agent at the inn, she is astounded to discover that he is the man in her dream who is the intended murder victim.
metadata.Actors: Otto Kruger, Nina Foch, William Wright
